FuncDef:
The reset arp attack slot command clears the ARP statistics from the attacked interface in a specified slot.
The reset arp attack interface command clears the ARP statistics from the attacked interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot number of the interface board.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Indicates the ARP statistics on the attacked interfaces of all interface boards.
-

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Running the reset arp attack command deletes specified ARP statistics. Therefore, exercise caution when running this command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
